title: 'Possibly his last chance' - Does Ashes success define Stokes' captaincy?
text:
Former England captain David Gower says the success of Ben Stokes' tenure as captain could depend on how his team perform in the upcoming Ashes series against Australia, adding that this might be Stokes' last chance to lift the famous urn.

READ MORE: Ashes predictions - TMS pundits have their say
summary: Former England captain David Gower says the success of Ben Stokes' tenure as  captain could depend on how his team perform in the upcoming Ashes series against Australia, adding that this might be Stokes' last chance to lift the famous urn.
